thread.section_title: Optima Villas opiniones | Opiniones de clientes sobre Optima Villas | optimavillaslanzarote.com
thread.title: Gitte Petersen
thread.title_full: Optima Villas evaluado por Gitte Petersen

author: Gitte Petersen
title: Gitte Petersen
text:
Hi Annelieke
I stayed with my 2 sons and their families in Villa Madelaine in Feb. 20017. and we really hada very nice stay
The house was fantastic and very well equiped. Everything was nice, clean and well kept. Enough space for 3 families/generations with small kids. Very nice playing areas for everyone. Fantastic view!! - an a nice and warm gated pool . The kids wanted to come back withiin the first 5 minuttes! And if I go back to Lanzarote I would try to rent the same house - or a house through Optima Villas. Very good service. I can also recommend Plus car - using af very simple concept. Thanks for giving us optimal condittions for our stay.
Kind regards
Gitte petersen
